DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith(R) Connection Endovascular Covered Stent Clinical Study is a clinical investigation to study the safety and performance of the Zenith(R) Connection Endovascular Covered Stent in conjunction with the Zenith(R) Branch Endovascular Graft-Iliac Bifurcation in the treatment of aorto-iliac and iliac aneurysms.
DOC.brief_title: Zenith(R) Connection Endovascular Covered Stent Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: An aortoiliac or iliac aneurysm of appropriate size Unsuitable distal sealing site for a traditional ZenithÂ® iliac leg graft within the common iliac artery Less than 18 years of age Inability or refusal to give informed consent Disease considerations that would compromise patient safety or study outcomes Unsuitable arterial anatomy
